pl.sql
Class RelationalDatabase

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--pl.sql.RelationalDatabase
public abstract class RelationalDatabase
extends java.lang.Object

Represents a relational database. Performs connection pooling. Methods getNewConnection() and getNewId() should be implemented by subclasses

          RelationalDatabase constructor.

getConnection

public java.sql.Connection getConnection()
                                  throws PlException
Returns a connection to this relational database. Connection will be taken from the pool or new connection will be created if the pool is empty.
Returns:
